Class HibernateToDoListDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • il.ac.shenkar.hibernate.model.dao.HibernateToDoListDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IToDoListDAO

    public class HibernateToDoListDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements IToDoListDAO
    This is the main DAO for the application the do CRUD using hibernate
    Author:
    Arel Gindos, Dassi Rosen, Lior Lerner
